attributes.action: have all mps who made fraudulant exspense claimed charged and prosecuted from the highest to the lowest position in the government
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i believe that to make false claims no matter for how much is a crime and believe that the police should act now and bring these so-called upstanding citizens to book if joe bloggs had done this they would be in jail by now the law is the law and mps should not be exempt for this

rejection.details: Government cannot prosecute individuals or organisations. It is the role of the police to investigate suspected crimes, and the role of the Crown Prosecution Service to decide whether there is a case to answer, and to prosecute.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
